title: How to Earn a Letter Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Send letters to other villagers.
steps.description:
All letters must be at least 10 characters in order for them to qualify towards the badge. Bronze rank: 50 letters sent
Silver rank: 100 letters sent
Gold rank: 200 letters sent

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. He’s wearing a jungle suit and he’s a walrus so it’s easy to spot him.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing the A button (Press the B button to make him talk faster).

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Send letters to other villagers. All letters must be at least 10 characters in order for them to qualify towards the badge. Bronze rank: 50 letters sent
Silver rank: 100 letters sent
Gold rank: 200 letters sent Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. He’s wearing a jungle suit and he’s a walrus so it’s easy to spot him. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing the A button (Press the B button to make him talk faster). View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
